notes: Successive attacks with Stygian Desolator do not stack the debuff, but refresh the duration instead.
The attacks first apply the debuff, then their own damage.
Works against every unit, including wards, buildings and allied units.
Replaces the projectile particle of ranged heroes with a red projectile.
Fully stacks with Orb of Corrosion, Orb of Destruction and Desolator. Does not Stack with Blight Stone.
abilities.description: Your attacks reduce the target's armor by 10 for 7 seconds.

name: Stygian Desolator
description: The original demonic favorite that served as basis for the beloved mortal design.
trivia: Stygian Desolator was the name of Desolator in the original Defense of the Ancients, it was in turn named after an item in Anarchy Online.
